TypeSignature.Value: .class nested public auto ansi abstract sealed beforefieldinit VisualStyleElement/TextBox extends System.Object

Docs.summary: Contains classes that provide objects for the parts of a text box. This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format:
## Remarks The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement.TextBox> class provides a foundation in which the following classes are defined:
- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement.TextBox.Caret>
- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement.TextBox.TextEdit>
Each of these classes provides one or more properties that return a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement> for each state of the text box element specified by the class name.
